verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שְׁמַ֬ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8605><s%> my prayer הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> give ear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תַּחֲנוּנַ֑י <S%H8469><s%> to my supplications בֶּאֱמֻנָתְךָ֥ <S%H530><s%> in thy faithfulness עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <S%H6030><s%> answer בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> me [and] in thy righteousness

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> And enter בְ֭מִשְׁפָּט <S%H4941><s%> not into judgment אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servant כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִצְדַּ֖ק <S%H6663><s%> be justified לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> for in thy sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> shall no man living

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רָ֘דַ֤ף <S%H7291><s%> hath persecuted אוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <S%H341><s%> For the enemy נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul דִּכָּ֣א <S%H1792><s%> down לָ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground חַיָּתִ֑י <S%H2416><s%> my life הוֹשִׁיבַ֥נִי <S%H3427><s%> he hath made me to dwell בְ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <S%H4285><s%> in darkness כְּמֵתֵ֥י <S%H4191><s%> dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> as those that have been long

וַתִּתְעַטֵּ֣ף <S%H5848><s%> overwhelmed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> within רוּחִ֑י <S%H7307><s%> Therefore is my spirit בְּ֝תוֹכִ֗י <S%H8432><s%> within יִשְׁתּוֹמֵ֥ם <S%H8074><s%> me is desolate לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> within me my heart

זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי <S%H2142><s%> I remember יָמִ֨ים ׀ <S%H3117><s%> the days מִקֶּ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old הָגִ֥יתִי <S%H1897><s%> I meditate בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> on all thy works בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> on the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hands אֲשׂוֹחֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7878><s%> I muse

פֵּרַ֣שְׂתִּי <S%H6566><s%> I stretch forth יָדַ֣י <S%H3027><s%> my hands אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you נַפְשִׁ֓י ׀ <S%H5315><s%> unto thee my soul כְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> land עֲיֵפָ֖ה <S%H5889><s%> [thirsteth] after thee as a thirsty לְךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

מַ֘הֵ֤ר <S%H4118><s%> me speedily עֲנֵ֨נִי ׀ <S%H6030><s%> Hear יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כָּלְתָ֪ה <S%H3615><s%> faileth ר֫וּחִ֥י <S%H7307><s%> my spirit אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> hide פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> not thy face מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <S%H4911><s%> from me lest I be like עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> who יֹ֥רְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> unto them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> into the pit

הַשְׁמִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <S%H8085><s%> Cause me to hear בַבֹּ֨קֶר ׀ <S%H1242><s%> in the morning חַסְדֶּךָ֮ <S%H2617><s%> thy lovingkindness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בְךָ֪ בָ֫טָ֥חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> for in thee do I trust הוֹדִיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3045><s%> cause me to know דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> the way ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> wherein אֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֝לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> to נָשָׂ֥אתִי <S%H5375><s%> for I lift up נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul
הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י ׀ <S%H341><s%> from mine enemies יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> about כִסִּֽתִי׃ <S%H3680><s%> I flee unto thee to hide

לַמְּדֵ֤נִי ׀ <S%H3925><s%> Teach לַֽעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> me to do רְצוֹנֶךָ֮ <S%H7522><s%> thy will כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> you אֱל֫וֹהָ֥י <S%H433><s%> God רוּחֲךָ֥ <S%H7307><s%> thy spirit טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] good תַּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <S%H5148><s%> lead בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me into the land מִישֽׁוֹר׃ <S%H4334><s%> of uprightness

לְמַֽעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> the sake שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> for thy name's יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי <S%H2421><s%> Quicken בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֓ ׀ <S%H6666><s%> sake for thy righteousness' תוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> sake bring מִצָּרָ֣ה <S%H6869><s%> out of trouble נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul

וּֽבְחַסְדְּךָ֮ <S%H2617><s%> And of thy mercy תַּצְמִ֪ית <S%H6789><s%> cut off אֹ֫יְבָ֥י <S%H341><s%> mine enemies וְֽ֭הַאֲבַדְתָּ <S%H6><s%> and destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צֹרֲרֵ֣י <S%H6887><s%> all them that afflict נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul כִּ֝֗י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> for I [am] thy servant
